org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer

Class MoveCostFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.CostFunction
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.MoveCostFunction

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
class MoveCostFunction
extends CostFunction
    Given the starting state of the regions and a potential ending state compute cost based upon the number of regions that have moved.
